client.java:9685: cannot find symbol symbol : method getLevelForXP(int,int) location: class client addSkillXP(40*getLevelForXP(playerXP[1], 1)); ^ client.java:9685: addSkillXP(int,int) in client cannot be applied to (int) addSkillXP(40*getLevelForXP(playerXP[1], 1)); ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Need help with fishing
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

You have a syntax error.

Try something like this?

if(UsedOnObjectID == 42 && playerLevel[playerFishing] >= 15) {
    if(ItemID == 303) {
        addItem(317, 1);
        addSkillXP(40*getLevelForXP(playerXP[1], 1);
        sM("You fish a shrimp");
        setAnimation(619);
    }
}

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with fishing
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

I was simply thinking of just adding a fishing spot that you use a net, pot, or harpoon on a fishing spot. I thought there was a way to only be able to use item on object but i put this code but i still get one error can someone please help me.

if(UsedOnObjectID == 42) && (playerLevel >= 15); if(ItemID == 303){ addItem(317, 1); addSkillXP(40*getLevelForXP(playerXP[1], 1); sM("You fish a shrimp"); setAnimation(619); }
so anyone got any idea what i did wrong?

D man

Read full topic
